big_picture_notes: Jude is a tightly constructed, single‑chapter polemical letter in classic Hellenistic form (salutation 1–2; body 3–23; doxology 24–25). Structural cohesion comes from pervasive triplets (hendiatris), aggressive historical typology (Israel/angels/Sodom; Cain/Balaam/Korah), and an inclusio of ‘kept’/‘keeping’ (1, 21, 24). The narrative arc moves from intended topic → urgent call to contend (3–4) → proof of certain judgment for intruders (5–16) → final exhortations to the faithful (17–23), concluding with a preservation‑focused doxology.

stories.story_title: The Call to Contend and the Doom of the Godless
stories.why_start_end_and_literary_glue: Start (1:1) epistolary opening marks the beginning; end (1:25) doxology completes the letter. Glue: recurring triplets, historical typology proving judgment, and ‘kept/keep’ inclusio framing the call to contend and God’s preserving power.

scenes.why_start_end_and_devices: Opening greeting to the kept/called; sudden shift to necessity—contend for the faith; certain ungodly intruders identified. Devices: vocative blessing, thesis/purpose turn, problem‑solution setup.
Remind: Israel, angels, Sodom—triad of precedents. Devices: typology, hendiatris, ‘likewise’ linkage to present case.
‘In like manner’ these defile/reject/blaspheme; Michael’s restrained dispute vs their ignorant reviling. Devices: crime triplet, contrast with angelic restraint, summary condemnation.

Woe! They walked in Cain’s way, rushed to Balaam’s error, perished in Korah’s rebellion; then negative nature images (clouds/trees/waves/stars). Devices: triple transgressors, vivid similes for barrenness and instability.

Enoch prophesied the Lord’s coming to convict all; concludes with a vice catalog: grumblers, faultfinders, boastful flatterers. Devices: prophetic quotation, comprehensive character summary closing the polemic.

scenes.scene_name: Apostolic Command: Build Up and Rescue
scenes.why_start_end_and_devices: ‘But you, beloved…’ remember apostles’ words; triple duties (build/pray/keep) and triple responses (have mercy/save with fear). Devices: hortatory turn, double triplets, pastoral strategy for perseverance and rescue.
To the One able to keep and present you—glory, majesty, dominion, authority—Amen. Devices: preservation inclusio, doxological ascription quartet, formal epistolary close.
